channel.title: TTP Team Search
channel.description:
I am trying/asking to get more people to join a team for my new server, [b]Trail To Paradise.[/b] TTP will be modeled after RS, meaning hard leveling, hard money making, etc.
We have a decent amount of people already (we even have [b]93dcthugs93[/b]!), but since the BETA is in 28 days and my coders aren't ever on, I need more people.
Please look over the list, go to the site, and join the [b]Trail[/b] team, responsible of 4 great servers.
Thanks ~Newb 2341
~CODER TEAM~ Senior Coder: Pwned ------------------------------ Quest Coders: 1. william1 2. ------------------------------ NPC Coders: 1. hippyss 2. ------------------------------ Spawn Coders: 1. Emaziz 2. ------------------------------ Misc. Coders: 1. Eh Pretty Easy 2. Zoltanman ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~FIELD TEAM~ Senior FT: NinjaSoD -------------------------------------- NPC FT: 1. 2. ------------------------------------- Quest FT: 1. JASON X 2. ------------------------------------- Item FT: 1. peng 2. Phillip_L_G ------------------------------------- Misc. FT: 1. n0t a h2x (link park69) 2. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~FORUM TEAM~ Senior FM: 93dcthug93 --------------------------- Tutorial FM: 1. 2. --------------------------- Application FM: 1. Jason W33D 2. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Please use this format:
[code]Experience: Servers CODED or WORKED on?: Servers ADMINED or MODDED on?: Have you ever played a Trail server, if yes, which one(s)?: Do you like the Trail series?: Do like RS?: Rate yourself at coding, 1-10:[/code]
PM me for the site URL, and be active.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2007, 09:39:51 PM[/size][hr]Any normal worker gets MOD spot, 10 mill (lots on the server) and 3 rares, 1 phat, h mask, and santa hat.

item.title: TTP Team Search
